displayName: Secrets should have the specified maximum validity period
description: Manage your organizational compliance requirements by specifying the maximum amount of time in days that a secret can be valid within your key vault.

metadata.displayName: The maximum validity period in days
metadata.description: Specify the maximum number of days a secret can be valid for. Secrets should be ephemeral. Using a secret with a long validity period is not recommended.
'Audit' allows a non-compliant resource to be created, but flags it as non-compliant. 'Deny' blocks the resource creation. 'Disable' turns off the policy.
